name: Classified Ads
author: wpdirectorykit.com

sections.description:
Classified Ads Plugin is Very easy to use and install, plugin will allow you to manage Classified Ads Listings, Categories, Fields from your admin dashboard.

Can be used as Business Directory Plugin to create Combined Classified ads website with multiple type of ads like: job directory, booking website, local business directory and service directory.

This is addon plugin for WP Directory Kit Plugin, so will configure fields, categories and import demo listings for Classified Ads Portal into WP Directory Kit.

Almost everything possible to design visually in Elementor, including front pages, resutls pages, listing preview pages etc.

Visual designing support for search form and result item/cards.

Videos

üëâ Check Documentation

üî•Classified ads Premium Featuresüî•

Addons ‚Äì All Premium features

Mobile App ‚Äì Classified ads iOS & Android mobile app

üèÜ UNLIMITED CUSTOM FIELDS

You can create unlimited custom fields and set them category-wise. So you can define which fields are visible in specific category.

  • Text Box
  • Text Area
  • Number
  • Select
  • Multi Select
  • Checkbox
  • and more…

üëâ SVG Maps WordPress Directory Plugin
Few weeks ago we build WordPress plugin to show SVG Maps on your Real Estate, Classified Ads, Business Directory or any other directory website.

üèÜ User Friendly

Classified Listing is crafted to provide the best possible user experience to all users, including the admins, buyers, and sellers of ad listings.
All your users will enjoy a smooth interface on any device since this plugin is fully responsive. This classified listing WordPress plugin makes your elements look great on all devices, whether they‚Äôre using desktops, tablets, or mobile phones.

Classified Listing supports the use of Free Open Street Maps to showcase the location of listings.

üèÜ Classified Ads Control

This classified ads WordPress plugin gives you a choice between automatic and manual approval of your listings. If you have too many users, automatic approval is best. On the other hand, manually approving listings help screen ads in detail before posting them.

üèÜ Earning From Your Listings [Pro]

You can make money from posting ads where users pay for each ad or for ad promotions, such as

  • Featured ads [Pro] ‚Äì Featured ads highlighted with a special background color and showing on specific website positions so this ads get
    more view
  • Ranking [Pro] ‚Äì Ad can have paid ranks, so ad with higher ranking showing on better position in results
  • Membership [Pro]: Classified Listing comes with the Store and Membership addon, which allows you to enable membership packages for sellers. You can offer an ad promotion option along with the membership packages.

üèÜ Official Premium Addons Here

üëâ Membership Features Addon: Login, Registration, Frontend Dashboard, Search for Agent, every Agent have own page with their Listings and Details, Membership Paid/Free Subscriptions/Payments .

üëâ Booking & Calendar Addon: Calendar and Availability Rates/Prices per Hour/Day/Week… Reservations from Listing Page based on Availability.

üëâ Favorites Addon: Visitors will be able to Save any listing as Favorite for later use, Manage from User Frontend Dashboard.

üëâ Multy Currency Addon: Automatically import and sync wanted currencies available in API and auto conver on Homepage Based on Switcher selection.

üëâ Import/Export Addon: XML Export, CSV/XML Import via popular Plugin WP All Import and Visual Fields Mapping.

üëâ Multy Currency Addon: Users will be able to rate listing or profiles based on configurable multiple criteria/options individually.

üëâ Profile picture uploader Addon: WordPress support only Gravatar, with this plugin visitors will be able to upload own image directly from Dashboard.

üëâ Mortgage Calculatory Addon: Allow Visitor to calculate Mortgage / Loan Prices based on related listing price or enter values manually.

üëâ Report Abuse Addon: Report Abuse button will allow your visitors to report abused listings directly to admin.

üëâ MailChimp Newslettery Addon: Generate email list ready to use on MailChimp Newsletter service.

üëâ Facebook Comments Addon: Connect with social network, show Facebook comments directly on your listing preview pages.

üëâ Compare Listings Addon: Your visitors will be able to compare listings, so will see up to 4 listings at once in table .

üëâ Save Search with Email Alerts Addon: Your visitors will be able to save search criteria, after that they will receive Email Alerts with all new/changed listings based on criteria, or will be able to run search from frontend dashboard.

üëâ Duplicate Listing Addon: One Click to Duplicate any listing from backend Dashboard.

üëâ WDK Claim / Take Ownership Addon: Your visitors will be able to Claim/Take Ownership on their Listing.

üëâ WDK PDF Download Addon: Download PDF Button Elementor Element for Listing preview page .

üëâ SVG Maps Addon: Enable Multiple SVG Maps in Elementor, Import Locations, Submaps locations support, quick search based on map.

üëâ Live Messages Chat Addon: Live chat option between users will simplify and provide faster communication .

üëâ Geo Coding Addon: Location Autodetection based on IP or Google API .

sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Extract classified-ads.zip into /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Is this standalone plugin?

No, Plugin is addon for WP Directory Kit, so will configure fields, categories and import demo listings for Classified Ads Portal into WP Directory Kit.

Does WP Directory Kit works with all themes?

Yes all themes supported

short_description: Build your Classified Ads Directory Portal based on Wp Directory Kit and Elementor Plugin
description:
Classified Ads Plugin is Very easy to use and install, plugin will allow you to manage Classified Ads Listings, Categories, Fields from your admin dashboard.

Can be used as Business Directory Plugin to create Combined Classified ads website with multiple type of ads like: job directory, booking website, local business directory and service directory.

This is addon plugin for WP Directory Kit Plugin, so will configure fields, categories and import demo listings for Classified Ads Portal into WP Directory Kit.

Almost everything possible to design visually in Elementor, including front pages, resutls pages, listing preview pages etc.

Visual designing support for search form and result item/cards.

Videos

üëâ Check Documentation

üî•Classified ads Premium Featuresüî•

Addons ‚Äì All Premium features

Mobile App ‚Äì Classified ads iOS & Android mobile app

üèÜ UNLIMITED CUSTOM FIELDS

You can create unlimited custom fields and set them category-wise. So you can define which fields are visible in specific category.

  • Text Box
  • Text Area
  • Number
  • Select
  • Multi Select
  • Checkbox
  • and more…

üëâ SVG Maps WordPress Directory Plugin
Few weeks ago we build WordPress plugin to show SVG Maps on your Real Estate, Classified Ads, Business Directory or any other directory website.

üèÜ User Friendly

Classified Listing is crafted to provide the best possible user experience to all users, including the admins, buyers, and sellers of ad listings.
All your users will enjoy a smooth interface on any device since this plugin is fully responsive. This classified listing WordPress plugin makes your elements look great on all devices, whether they‚Äôre using desktops, tablets, or mobile phones.

Classified Listing supports the use of Free Open Street Maps to showcase the location of listings.

üèÜ Classified Ads Control

This classified ads WordPress plugin gives you a choice between automatic and manual approval of your listings. If you have too many users, automatic approval is best. On the other hand, manually approving listings help screen ads in detail before posting them.

üèÜ Earning From Your Listings [Pro]

You can make money from posting ads where users pay for each ad or for ad promotions, such as

  • Featured ads [Pro] ‚Äì Featured ads highlighted with a special background color and showing on specific website positions so this ads get
    more view
  • Ranking [Pro] ‚Äì Ad can have paid ranks, so ad with higher ranking showing on better position in results
  • Membership [Pro]: Classified Listing comes with the Store and Membership addon, which allows you to enable membership packages for sellers. You can offer an ad promotion option along with the membership packages.

üèÜ Official Premium Addons Here

üëâ Membership Features Addon: Login, Registration, Frontend Dashboard, Search for Agent, every Agent have own page with their Listings and Details, Membership Paid/Free Subscriptions/Payments .

üëâ Booking & Calendar Addon: Calendar and Availability Rates/Prices per Hour/Day/Week… Reservations from Listing Page based on Availability.

üëâ Favorites Addon: Visitors will be able to Save any listing as Favorite for later use, Manage from User Frontend Dashboard.

üëâ Multy Currency Addon: Automatically import and sync wanted currencies available in API and auto conver on Homepage Based on Switcher selection.

üëâ Import/Export Addon: XML Export, CSV/XML Import via popular Plugin WP All Import and Visual Fields Mapping.

üëâ Multy Currency Addon: Users will be able to rate listing or profiles based on configurable multiple criteria/options individually.

üëâ Profile picture uploader Addon: WordPress support only Gravatar, with this plugin visitors will be able to upload own image directly from Dashboard.

üëâ Mortgage Calculatory Addon: Allow Visitor to calculate Mortgage / Loan Prices based on related listing price or enter values manually.

üëâ Report Abuse Addon: Report Abuse button will allow your visitors to report abused listings directly to admin.

üëâ MailChimp Newslettery Addon: Generate email list ready to use on MailChimp Newsletter service.

üëâ Facebook Comments Addon: Connect with social network, show Facebook comments directly on your listing preview pages.

üëâ Compare Listings Addon: Your visitors will be able to compare listings, so will see up to 4 listings at once in table .

üëâ Save Search with Email Alerts Addon: Your visitors will be able to save search criteria, after that they will receive Email Alerts with all new/changed listings based on criteria, or will be able to run search from frontend dashboard.

üëâ Duplicate Listing Addon: One Click to Duplicate any listing from backend Dashboard.

üëâ WDK Claim / Take Ownership Addon: Your visitors will be able to Claim/Take Ownership on their Listing.

üëâ WDK PDF Download Addon: Download PDF Button Elementor Element for Listing preview page .

üëâ SVG Maps Addon: Enable Multiple SVG Maps in Elementor, Import Locations, Submaps locations support, quick search based on map.

üëâ Live Messages Chat Addon: Live chat option between users will simplify and provide faster communication .

üëâ Geo Coding Addon: Location Autodetection based on IP or Google API .
